title: Cops  2170  The  Power  of  Law
description:
Title: Cops 2170: The Power of Law
Genre: turn-based / tactical / sci-fi
Released: 27th January 2005
Developer: ZAO MiST land South 
Publisher: Strategy First Inc
Description:
Cops 2170: The Power of Law is a hybrid of RPG and tactical strategy. The central storyline unfolds in the future where the cyberpunk culture and a highly-urban oriented society have populated North America. The government watches over everything for the safety of the public. Society is completely under their control. Cyber links are implanted into each newborn child, marking their host with a unique ID. Cities have turned into monstrous urban centers giving the term urban sprawl a hazardous new meaning.

You are Katy, officially Katrin, a young female graduate of the Police Academy. So far, you have been living in an ideal black-and-white world, your faith based on universal values of truth and justice. As civil war is about to break out, you face the dangers of the streets, and some enemies internal to the authority your represent, called The System. Team up with up to seven other officers, increase your skills and gain experience from your missions in graphically stunning cyberpunk environments.

How to play:
1) Mount or burn disc image Cops2170.iso;
2) Run Program Files/Setup.exe or use the autorun menu if it opens and install the game;
3) Launch the game using its main executable or shortcuts and play it without the disc (DRM free).

! Notice
The game comes already updated to the latest version.

If you like the game, BUY it!
